resources.string: Setup additional custom HTTP headers for proxy requests
Add custom HTTP headers to all outgoing HTTP proxy requests
Warning: headers with empty names will be ignored!
Error: header name contains illegal characters!
Insufficient balance for Speed Boost purchase.
Price of Speed Boost is out of date. Updating local products.
You have an active Speed Boost purchase.
Speed Boost product not found. Your app may be out of date. Please check for updates.
The app has entered an invalid state. Please reinstall the app to continue using PsiCash.
Your PsiCash login has expired. Log into your account and try again.
The PsiCash server indicated that the request was invalid. Please try again later.
Server error. Please try again in a few minutes
A critical error has occurred. Please send feedback.
A critical error has occurred. Your PsiCash balance and other state have been reset.
A recoverable error has occurred. Please try again.
Video is not available, try again later.
An unexpected error has occurred, please send feedback.
Please start Psiphon to make a Speed Boost purchase.
Please wait for tunnel to connect to make a Speed Boost purchase.
Cannot retrieve PsiCash balance from the server. Please send feedback.
Cannot retrieve PsiCash balance from the server at the moment. Please try again later.
The PsiCash server responded with an error while trying to log you in. Please send feedback.
The PsiCash server responded with an error while trying to log you in. Please try again later.
The PsiCash server responded with an error while trying to make the purchase. Please send feedback.
The PsiCash server responded with an error while trying to make the purchase. Please try again later.
Subscription options are currently not available, please try again later.
You must disconnect from Psiphon to watch a video and earn PsiCash
IMPORTANT: Creating a PsiCash account will help preserve your PsiCash if you uninstall Psiphon Pro, clear the app\'s storage, or use Psiphon on another device.
You must connect to Psiphon to activate a Speed Boost, click the button below and try again
Your Psiphon subscription gives you premium access!

Your Psiphon subscription already gives you always-on Speed Boost, so there is no reason to buy more. Your PsiCash balance will be retained should you ever decide to cancel your subscription. \n\nYou can still access your PsiCash account settings by navigating to Options > More Options > PsiCash Account
Please wait for Psiphon to finish connecting to use PsiCash store
Your PsiCash balance is out of date. Connect to Psiphon to refresh.
You have an unfinished PsiCash purchase
Connect to Psiphon to finalize your transaction
Please wait while we are finalizing your purchase
PsiCash purchase is currently not available, please try again later
You do not have enough PsiCash to activate this Speed Boost option.
Apps not working? Click here to improve your Psiphon experience!
Some Internet traffic is not supported by the free version of Psiphon Pro. Purchase a subscription or Speed Boost to unlock the full potential of your Psiphon experience.
You are using the basic plan with speed limited to 5 Mb/s. Would you like to upgrade to the unlimited plan?
You are using the free, ad supported, speed limited, port restricted plan. You can keep using this plan or upgrade to one of our premium plans
Psiphon is no longer free in your region. Please upgrade to one of our premium plans to keep using the service
Interruption-free, unlimited speed with unrestricted ports with each time pass purchase
Interruption-free, high speed up to 5 Mb/s with unrestricted ports
Interruption-free, unlimited speed with unrestricted ports

Cancel your subscription any time in the subscriptions section on Google Play. When you cancel your subscription, you will lose access to the premium features offered by the subscription\'s terms at the end of the current billing period. Only one free trial per user. At the end of your free trial period, you will be automatically charged the amount in your subscription\'s terms. To avoid charges, cancel the subscription before the trial period expires.
A time pass is a single use license that is valid for a certain period of time from the moment it is purchased and does not automatically renew after its expiry, unlike a subscription.
The username or password entered was incorrect
Cannot log in when Psiphon is not running
Cannot log in while Psiphon is still connecting
PsiCash update cannot be retrieved because Psiphon is not running
PsiCash update cannot be retrieved because Psiphon has not finished connecting
You are logged into your PsiCash account. The preexisting balance from this device has been transferred into your account, but this is the last time a balance merge will occur.
Would you like to log out of your PsiCash account now?
Being connected to the Psiphon network enables a more secure PsiCash logout. Would you like to continue anyway?
Being connected to the Psiphon network enables a more secure PsiCash logout. Would you like to wait for Psiphon to finish connecting or continue anyway?
PsiCash account sign in is not available
Please wait for Psiphon to finish connecting to access PsiCash account sign in
You must connect to Psiphon to access PsiCash account sign in, click the button below and try again
Please log into your PsiCash account to access PsiCash store
PsiCash unexpected error, please send feedback
Create your PsiCash account or sign in now!
We strongly encourage you to make a PsiCash account. Having an account allows you to share your balance between devices and protect your purchases.
Do not remind me for 7 days
Would you like to close this window now?
An error has occurred. Please try again later.
Please wait while Psiphon is connecting
Creating a PsiCash account will help preserve your PsiCash if you reinstall the app or use Psiphon on another device. Please visit %s#psicash-account to learn more.
Psiphon is no longer free in your region.
Psiphon is no longer free in your region, tap here to learn more.
How to access Psiphon in your region.
Access to Psiphon in your region now requires your support. Help keep Psiphon accessible for people who need it most by selecting an available option to continue.
Run the Conduit mobile app and stay connected to Psiphon for free
Buy a subscription plan for uninterrupted access to Psiphon
Buy a Speed Boost with your PsiCash for timed access to Psiphon
Update to the latest version of Conduit to access this feature
Update to the latest version of Psiphon Pro to access this feature
